weeks.title: Audit & Baseline
tasks: Export YouTube Analytics for last 10 videos
Create Google Sheet: Columns [Video, CTR%, Retention%, AVD, Date, Notes]
Enter baseline data for all 10 videos
Identify average CTR, retention %, and watch time
Screenshot retention curves for 5 recent videos
Watch your top 3 performing videos (analyze why they won)
Watch your 3 lowest-performing videos (identify problem areas)
Research 5 MrBeast videos in your niche
Set up A/B testing tracking template

weeks.title: Hook Optimization Sprint
tasks: Rewrite titles for NEXT 5 videos using IMPACT formula
For each new title, write first VO sentence as EXACT match
Design thumbnail for next 5 videos using Template #1 (High Contrast Shock)
Verify first 2-3 shots feature thumbnail elements
Review all 5 new titles and thumbnails with team

weeks.title: First Testing Cycle
tasks: Upload Video #1 with new hook + new thumbnail
Set up YouTube A/B test for thumbnail
Compare to baseline: Higher or lower?
Compare initial performance: Video #1 vs. Video #2
Final decision: Keep winning thumbnail/title or adjust?

weeks.title: Analysis & Iteration
tasks: Decision matrix: Winner vs Marginal vs Retest

weeks.title: Editing Speed & Pacing
tasks: Select one recent video for re-edit
Re-edit selected video with faster cuts and more B-roll
Compare retention curves BEFORE vs AFTER

weeks.title: Description & Metadata Optimization
tasks: Create description template with keyword + value prop
Identify primary keyword for next 5 videos
Create tagging system (Exact, LSI, Category, Channel)
Update all older videos with new description template

weeks.title: Community & Cross-Promotion
tasks: Create 3 engagement questions for next 3 videos
Post engagement question 1 hour before upload
PIN a comment with clear CTA
Extract 3 clips from recent long-form videos for Shorts
Post 3 Shorts with link to full video

weeks.title: Analytics Deep Dive & Month 2 Wrap
tasks: Identify top 2-3 tactics that moved the needle
Identify 2-3 tactics that didn't move needle
